name: Ensure Node.js filesystem are closed
description: This rule will check the official Node.js syntax fs are closed. This rule is compliant with CISQ OMG ASCRM-CWE-772 and ASCSM-CWE-772 recommendations
output:
Line and column for each violation 
Associated value => number of violations found
reference:
https://nodejs.org/api/fs.html 
OMG CISQ Recommendation: ASCRM-CWE-772 and ASCSM-CWE-772
remediation:
Always close a filesystem after using open. 
Always use closeSync after using openSync.
total: Number of javascript source codes using fs

qualityStandards.name: ASCRM-CWE-772: Missing Release of Resource after Effective Lifetime
ASCSM-CWE-772: Missing Release of Resource after Effective Lifetime
